comments:
Opening a remote task with a non numeric id causes  an exception.

-- Error Log --
Date: Sat Feb 17 12:27:52 EST 2007
Message: An internal error occurred during: "Opening repository task abc".
Severity: Error
Plugin ID: org.eclipse.core.jobs
Stack Trace:
java.lang.NumberFormatException: For input string: "abc"
	at java.lang.NumberFormatException.forInputString(NumberFormatException.java:48)
	at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Integer.java:447)
	at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Integer.java:497)
	at org.eclipse.mylar.internal.trac.core.TracTaskDataHandler.getTaskData(TracTaskDataHandler.java:54)
	at org.eclipse.mylar.tasks.ui.OpenRepositoryTaskJob.run(OpenRepositoryTaskJob.java:84)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.jobs.Worker.run(Worker.java:58)
